div.a: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1761 Babylonia, c. 1900 ? (118) Burial: c. 280 B.C. Contents: 108+ AR Alexander III: 60 lifetime and early post. tetradr. (Amphipolis 10 ANS 1944.100.29184 ANS 1944.100.29110 , Pella 2 ANS 1944.100.29356 ANS 1944.100.29425 , Sicyon 1, Sardes 1, Side 1, Tarsus 1, Salamis ANS 1944.100.34152 ANS 1944.100.341502, Aradus 13, Marathus 3, Byblus 3, Sidon 2, Ace 3, Babylon 16, Ecbatana 1, barb. imit. 1) 1 didr. (Babylon) 1 dr. (Aradus) Philip III: 7 tetradr. (Aradus 1 ANS 1944.100.34884 ANS 1944.100.34924 , Marathus 2, Babylon 3, Susa 1) Athens, oriental imit.: 1 tetradr. (Mazaces) Seleucus I: 32 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Ti- grim 28 ANS 1944.100.44874 ANS 1944.100.44930 ANS 1944.100.44873 ANS 1944.100.44943 ANS 1944.100.44922 ANS 1944.100.44933 ANS 1944.100.44954 ANS 1944.100.44928 ANS 1944.100.44950 ANS 1944.100.44949 ANS 1944.100.44916 ANS 1944.100.44872 ANS 1944.100.44915 ANS 1944.100.44940 ANS 1944.100.44936 ANS 1944.100.44938 ANS 1944.100.44945 ANS 1944.100.44882 ANS 1944.100.44951 ANS 1944.100.44946 ANS 1944.100.44918 ANS 1944.100.44937 ANS 1944.100.44920 ANS 1944.100.44985 ANS 1944.100.44986 ANS 1944.100.44921 ANS 1944.100.44871 , Susa 2 ANS 1944.100.73350 , Ecbatana 1 ANS 1944.100.73467 ANS 1944.100.73476 , Seleuceia Pieria 1) 4 dr. (Seleuceia ad Tigrim) 1 hemidr.? (Persepolis) Tyre: 1 didr. ANS 1944.100.34913 ANS 1944.100.34902 ANS 1944.100.34912 ANS 1944.100.34921 ANS 1944.100.34919 ANS 1944.100.34909 Disposition: New York 67 Newell, ESM and WSM, indices of hoards, s. v. Babylonia (Noe 118). Also known as Pro- fessor Haynes' Babylonian Hd. A tetradrachm of Eumenes I, among the New York coins, although clearly ticketed as from Haynes' Babylonian Hd., is presumably intrusive
